directions: Cut the ribs apart if necessary. Place the separated ribs, apples, apple juice, onions, apple cider vinegar, and water into a large soup pot, and bring to a boil. Cover, reduce heat to a simmer, and cook the ribs until tender, about 4 hours.
ingredients: 4 McIntosh apples - cored, peeled, and cut into large chunks
title: Apple Slow Cooked Beef Ribs
